title: Why is a disposable phone number necessary?
answer: This is a temporary phone number that functions without a SIM card and is not linked to a
specific device. Communication is carried out via the Internet using certain software.
Usually such numbers only accept SMS for registration, but the SMS-Activate service also supports
verification by call and voice bot.
